title: Australian diary. No. 041
creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: J. Rosetti of Sydney and his collegues and apprentices demonstrate the stages of making a large stained glass window, an ancient art. A pet rabbit has a tea party as a young Sydney child puts on a tea party for her pets. Cane growing from soil preparation and planting to carting to the mill in the cane growing bely in Queensland and northern NSW is shown.
